t: Amazon study: Every 100ms in Added Page Load Time Cost 1% in Revenue
s: April 21, 2024 - Amazon did a study that found every 100MS in latency cost 1% of sales. The lesson being: page speed matters — and a slow site that makes customers wait hurts your bottom line.

t: Amazon’s faster delivery speeds are resonating with customers
s: November 12, 2024 - Amazon is on a never-ending mission to speed up delivery: The retailer’s latest initiatives, including smart glasses and streamlined grocery fulfillment, will help cut costs and encourage shoppers to order more—and more often.

t: Amazon Prime members enjoyed fastest-ever delivery speeds in 2024, and US members saved on average over $500 on delivery fees
s: Amazon delivered over 9 billion items the same or next day around the world last year, and Prime members globally saved nearly $95 billion on fast, free delivery.
